venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
This is the 4th movie of the Twilight Saga, and part 1 of the adaptation of the final book. Jennifer Sheehan suggested this meetup and she has agreed to serve as event host, so I added this to the schedule.

I had to change the date to Dec 1st/Thursday -shooting for the 7pm movie.  Would love to meet after at Uno's for drinks and a bite to eat and to discuss the movie.  Hope you can make it.  I look forward to meeting you.

 

Thanks,

 

Jennifer
item.how_to_find_us: I'll meet everyone interested at 6:30 in the movie theatre entrance near coldstone. I'll be wearing a black and white sweater.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Twilight: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
